fruitSellerPersonas.name: Luna Greene
fruitSellerPersonas.title: The Organic Enthusiast
fruitSellerPersonas.background: A former environmental scientist who decided to pursue her passion for sustainable farming.
fruitSellerPersonas.specialAbility: Can grow organic fruits faster and sell them at a premium price.

fruitSellerPersonas.name: Aiden Bytes
fruitSellerPersonas.title: The Tech-Savvy Innovator
fruitSellerPersonas.background: A computer programmer turned fruit farmer who uses cutting-edge technology in his orchard.
fruitSellerPersonas.specialAbility: Can automate certain processes, reducing labor costs.

fruitSellerPersonas.name: Maria Cortez
fruitSellerPersonas.title: The Family Traditionalist
fruitSellerPersonas.background: Inherited her family's orchard that has been passed down for generations.
fruitSellerPersonas.specialAbility: Has secret family recipes for preserves that sell for high prices.

fruitSellerPersonas.name: Jack Sellers
fruitSellerPersonas.title: The Marketing Guru
fruitSellerPersonas.background: A former advertising executive who decided to buy an orchard and apply his marketing skills.
fruitSellerPersonas.specialAbility: Can boost fruit sales through clever advertising campaigns.

fruitSellerPersonas.name: Zara Tropica
fruitSellerPersonas.title: The Exotic Fruit Specialist
fruitSellerPersonas.background: A world traveler who collected rare fruit seeds and decided to start her own unique orchard.
fruitSellerPersonas.specialAbility: Can grow and sell exotic fruits that fetch higher prices.
